cause.description:
Thousands of Zimbabwean people risk everything they have to try and get into South Africa in hopes of having a future. The situation in Zimbabwe has become so bad that people can no longer ignore it. It's the moral duty of South Africa and Zimbabwe's other neighbouring states to help the innocent people of Zimbabwe. Refugee camps are urgently needed!
1. Help innocent Zimbabweans
2. Build refugee camps
3. Help control illegal immigrants
cause.mission: Convince the SA government to build refugee camps
cause.name: SA needs to build refugee camps to help Zimbabweans...NOW
